title.rendered: NEWTECONS HELD A FIELD TOUR FOR STUDENTS OF HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY

content.rendered:
(July 17, 2020 – Ho Chi Minh City) Newtecons Human Resources in coordination with the Mechanic – Electrical Department organized a field trip for students of the Electrical – Electronics Faculty and Heating and Refrigeration Technology Department under Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology. This program is part of a series of career-oriented and competency development activities for talented students, which provide a full industry background for students to embark on their career after graduation. 

Students of Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology visited the project

During the tour, students were facilitated to experience the practical working environment, acquire a lot of knowledge about the MEP system from Newtecons’ Site Management Board. Students’ questions about professional knowledge and skills were answered thoroughly by representatives of Newtecons’ Mechanic – Electrical Department.

Representatives of Newtecons’ Mechanic – Electrical Department briefed students on the MEP system at the project

“Although I have learned about the profession before, today I am really excited by the scale and professionalism of the MEP system at the project. As well, their sharing of professional knowledge and career orientation give me a big encouragement on the way ahead”- said a student.

Seeking and nurturing young talents at their schooling is always a key practice to build an excellent team consistent with the Company’s culture. By this program, Newtecons believes that students would accumulate an extensive knowledge background and become talented engineers to join the Newtecons family in the future.
